title-group.article-title: Estimating Directions in Extending Generalized Partially Linear Single-Index Models

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2007 American Statistical Association, the Institute of Mathematical Statistics, and the Interface Foundation of North America

abstract.p: This article develops an estimation method for generalized partially linear single-index models that can be extended to multi-index models that deal with two sets of predictors. We provide theoretical justification for the method. Illustrative examples are also presented.
